Classes in suncertify.presentation that implement BookingView
 class BookingViewImp
          This class implements the BookingView and therefore must implement the methods in this interface.
 

Fields in suncertify.presentation declared as BookingView
private  BookingView BookingControllerImp.view
          Holds a reference to the view.
 

Fields in suncertify.presentation with type parameters of type BookingView

          Holds a list of registered listeners.
private  java.util.List<BookingView> BookingModelNwImp.changeListeners
          Holds an ArrayList that collects listeners (Observers) of this class the subject.
 

Methods in suncertify.presentation with parameters of type BookingView
 void BookingModel.addChangeListener(BookingView view)
          This allows the view part of the presentation tier to register itself as a listener so it can react to change events in this object.
 void BookingModelImp.addChangeListener(BookingView view)
          This allows the view part of the presentation tier to register itself as a listener so it can react to change events in this object.
 void BookingModelNwImp.addChangeListener(BookingView view)
          This method adds a BookingView to the list of listeners (Observers).
 

Constructors in suncertify.presentation with parameters of type BookingView
BookingControllerImp(BookingModel model, BookingView view)
          The constructor takes a BookingModel and a BookingModel, then initializes the model and view variables and registers itself with the view as a listener.
